title: I CANT OPEN LEAGUE
body: I have been trying to open league now for 10-20 mins and i have tried everything but it doesnt seem to do anything i was gonna play in ranked and im suppose to be in game but it didnt let me recommect and then it closed and now i can not open it....

replies.body: I wonder if you were having this problem around the same time that the weird patcher loop issue arose. If so, you should be able to get logged back in and play normally now, but definitely hit me back up if you're still having this problem!
